---

Controls:

Movement:  WASD (keys) or/and the arrow keys

Jump: Space

Shooting: Click with the left mouse button [Fire(1)] at any point on the screen

Pause menu (Open/Close): P

Collect items: Touch the items with the player's body

Summary of the story:

Reboot is a 2D adventure platformer game in which you control a small robot through various abandoned places. He has been reactivated in an old facility for an unknown reason and is now searching for his origin. Along the way, many dangers and puzzles await him, which the player must avoid or solve in order to reach one of the portals that connect important points on Earth. We developed the game with Unity, programmed in C#. At the moment we mainly use freely available assets from the internet, but as soon as the system works we will create our own.

Industry tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

Pixel art Forest: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest

Features:

Full screen: Toggle Full screen via Main menu > Options > Full screen(-toggle) or via Unity/Itch.io.

Volume: Set the volume each of the music and of the sound effects! So you can play with your preferences!

Quality of the graphics (Beta): Change the quality of the game from Very Low to Ultra!  Play with your specs!

Quit (Feedback-button): If you don't want to play anymore, you can 'quit' (in the pause-/main menu) and then, you will be redirected to the feedback-/criticism-/bugreports-topic, where you can tell us your experience with the game!

We would be so happy, not important whether good or bad experience, but we hope, you have a good experience.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

To do that, we need your input! Without this, we can can't do big and better things. We only need us you!
